title: PESEdit.com 2012 Patch 4.1 and 4.1.1
description:
New Features:

    Faces: Around 50 new faces (e.g. AgÃƒÂ¼ero, Cristiano Ronaldo, Modric)
    Kits: Aalen, Alcorcon, Almeria, Athletic Club, Aue, Barcelona, Barnsley, Bayern MÃƒÂ¼nchen, Bielefeld, Blackburn, Bochum, Bolton, Bremen, Celta Vigo, Cittadella, Deportivo La Coruna, Dortmund, Eintracht Frankfurt, Elche, FSV Frankfurt, Fulham, FÃƒÂ¼rth, Genoa, Girona, Hannover, Hercules, Hertha BSC, Juventus, Kaiserslautern, KÃƒÂ¶ln, Las Palmas, Lokomotiv Moscow, Malaga, Manchester City, Manchester United, Murcia, MÃƒÂ¶nchengladbach, Napoli, Norwich, Nottingham Forest, NÃƒÂ¼rnberg, Pescara, Rayo Vallecano, Reading, Real Madrid, Regensburg, Southampton, Sporting CP, St Pauli, Steaua, Valencia, Villarreal, West Ham
    Selector: Simplified switches selection
    Teams: 2 new teams: Ternana & Spezia
    Transfers: Completed summer transfers + many newly created players


How to use:

    Switch PESEdit.com EURO 2012 Patch OFF (skip if you don't have the EURO patch)
    Delete the folders 'pesedit', 'GDB' inside 'PES 2012/kitserver' (optional)
    Install the patch using install.exe, make sure to choose the directory you installed PES 2012 to.
    Start the game via pes2012.exe / start menu folder "PESEdit.com 2012 Patch" / PESEDIT SELECTOR

4.1.1
Adds correct edit mode player faces for ~50 Serie B players who previously had default faces.
